long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With her graceful appearance and captivating snow-covered surroundings, Xayah, the fierce yet elegant champion from League of Legends, takes on the winter season with unparalleled style and strength.

Her winter-themed attire blends seamlessly with the cool, crisp air, while the snowy landscape around her adds an enchanting touch to your browser. Xayah’s regal presence and her sharp gaze make this live wallpaper a perfect tribute to her mastery of the art of war. The soft snowfall complements her sharp feathers and vibrant colors, turning your screen into a mesmerizing winter wonderland.

Key Features:
❄️ Xayah in Winter: Watch Xayah navigate through a beautiful winter scene, her feathers glistening in the cold.
🌨️ Snowy Environment: A serene snowfall effect brings the beauty of winter right to your screen.
🔍 Integrated Search Bar: Use your favorite search engine directly from your new tab for a smooth browsing experience.
🕒 Clock and Date: The clock and date feature keeps you on track while enjoying this elegant wallpaper.
🔗 Shortcuts: Add custom shortcuts for easy access to your most-visited websites.
Let Winter Wanderer Xayah bring both beauty and strength to your browser with her icy elegance.
